issues.title: In a conflict between a render phase annotation and the naming convention, the explicit annotation should win
Yellow highlight remains on updated zone if zone is re-updated too quickly
Submit component: using image parameter prevents selected event from being fired
Incorrect encoding of single quotes for Ajax requests
TypeCoercer.explain incorrectly reports the plan to coerce from primitive types to wrapper types
Component LinkSubmit doesn't work
When using the @Validate annotation, spaces around the commas that separate contraints cause runtime exceptions
Tapestry tutorial documentation refers to old archtype command
Property expressions that include method invocations that in turn reference properties result in spurious error about "root"
NPE when defining a component using just t:id and no type or @Component annotation
The FormFragment and LinkSubmit components create a hidden field whose id ends with ":hidden"
Tapestry should not attempt to GZip flash movies (.swf files)
URL rewriting documentation contains an example that won't compile due to lack of a return value
The documentation of DefaultNullFieldStrategy#replaceFromClient() is wrong about what gets returned
Included JavaScript libraries are not properly uniqued within an Ajax partial update response
PropertyConduitSourceImpl should use english locale (instead of default locale) when evaluating decimals
JavaScript aggregation can be inefficient across multiple pages with different JS requirements
Initialization JavaScript needs help when order counts
CLONE -Linksubmit doesn't work inside a form with Zone parameter set
Exception messages in the pageload packages should be localized
AbstractIntegrationTest's "assertTextPresent" only checks the first value
ParallelExecutor service throws RejectedExecutionException if more then THREAD_POOL_MAX_SIZE jobs are submitted
Form component generates invalid xHtml: there should not be the "name" attribute
the component rendering page of the user guide is not generated by maven
Asset dispatcher allows any file inside the webapp visible and downloadable
Message about incompatible return type of a render phase method is misleading
Javasisst 3.9.0.GA not available from central repository
SpringModuleDef unnecessarily hard-codes that the type of object stored in the context as a ConfigurableWebApplicationContext when any object implementing ApplicationContext is sufficient
BaseOptimizedSessionPersistedObject does not work correctly with Tomcat & Jetty
prototype1.6.0 not support for ie8
Tapestry should ignore (public) synthetic methods in module classes
MetaDataLocatorImpl.findMeta(String, String, Class) doesn't check contributed defaults - breaks SECURE_PAGE contributions
It is not possible to attach a validation event listener to a Palette (or other <select> field)
Generation of Component Reference failed on Windows
Tapestry's customized Blackbird implementation sends a dubious cookie value over every request
Fix PartialMarkupDocumentLinkerTest.stylesheet_link()
Contribute 'properties' file extension to the configuration of ResourceDigestGenerator
BeanModel methods reorder, include and exclude should return BeanModel<T> (not BeanModel<?>)
Blackbird console should not add cookies to requests
Stack size too large exception, related to PropertyExpressionLexer
Calling MarkupWriter.element() with an even number of arguments throws ArrayIndexOutOfBounds exception, not a useful exception about omitting a attribute name or value
Injeting Tapestry Services to Spring Beans is completely undocumented
Tapestry wiki link links to nothing for locales other then en
LinkImpl does not handle parameters properly when passed into the constructor
Zone should fire a heart beat event
Documentation for event handler methods should go into detail about returns true or false
When a ValueEncoder is unable to convert an id to a entity, it should wrap the underlying type coercion exception to describe the input and expected output type
Unnecessary and severe lock contention in PerthreadManagerImpl
Default name "submit" for submit component breaks javascript function submit()
Ajax event handler methods that return a page instance, page class or page name should cause the client to redirect to that page, but doesn't work in IE7 or 8 if the URL has a query param
When a URL rewriting rule changes the path for a rendered link (component event or page render), any query parameters associated with the original link are lost
Errors component includes an @Environmental for FormSupport, but doesn't use it
Exception report failed to render due to NPE inside session-persisted objects' toString()
PageCallback should be marked with the @ImmutableSessionPersistedObject annotation
In some cases you can invoke Form.recordError() and the Form will still fire a success (not a failure) event
Garbled exception message when a component is defined in a namespace that is not properly defined as a Tapestry library namespace
Request to Application Root path ignores ComponentRequestFilter's
French translations for number format error message
Fix typo in tapestry-hibernate/src/site/apt/userguide.apt: HibernateTransactionAdviser should be HibernateTransactionAdvisor
Injecting a Logger into a non-service object, created as part of constructing a service configuration, should work but doesn't
NPE from Any component when invoking getClientId() before the component renders
Using URLRewriteRules will fail for component event links if the page has an activation context
URLRewriting causes confusion about the incoming Request path, leading to incorrect optimized relative URLs
PropertyDisplayBlocks causes NullPointerException when property of type Calendar is null
@IncludeJavaScriptLibrary and @IncludeStylesheet may incorrectly calculate resources in component sub-classes
Component classes page of the guide should be much more specific that only component classes go in pages, components, etc.
Not able to pass an empty string as appName to PageTester
XSS vulnerability in calendar component
In IE8, forms that should submit using Ajax are triggering full page requests due to a client-side JavaScript error
Created component constructor may use too many parameters
RenderSupport.addScriptLink(String) deprecated and removed without replacement
Tapestry POM should reference only the Apache Nexus repository, not the tapestry.formos.com repository
The @QueryParameter annotation uses TypeCoercer to convert from request parameter strings to method parameter values, it should use the ValueEncoder

When a template contains a reference to an unknown component, the new UnknownValueException is reported but the Location is no longer reported, making it much harder to determine where the error occurred
When a service implementation is reloadable, it will not eager load
Page activation context lost when redirecting from HTTP to HTTPS due to the @Secure annotation
Localized root path request results in a 404 error if Index page is not available
Bean editor model for <class name> already contains a property model for property <property name> when combining model parameter with add parameter of BeanEditor or BeanEditForm
Deleting a live-reloaded class can result in a non-descriptive "Parameter url was null." exception
If a Zone's id parameter is bound, then the clientId property should return that value, even before the Zone renders
On ajax request, template body doesn't render if page is new in pagepool or if server restarted
BeanModelSource should recognize public field as properties, but doesn't
Tapestry.ajaxFailureHandler has an incorrect signature for an Ajax.Request onException callback
Updating multiple zones within a Form creates anomalous empty text fields
Tapestry holds onto the verbose descriptions of component class transformations, causing a memory leak
Live lock when using compressed and virtual assets due to ByteArrayOutputStream being synchronized
It is not possible to override the default Translator contributions to the TranslatorSource service
FormEventManager.setSubmittingElement(element) creates input element with type="input"
A space is added to a HTML start comment sequence making it impossible to add IE conditional comments
LinkSubmit component doesn't work when form contains Select component with default id
java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException from UpdateListenerHub when a weak reference is reclaimed
Dynamically adding JavaScript libraries to a page via a partial page update does not seem to work consistently in Safari and Chrome
ClassTransformation deprecated a bunch of methods, then refers to replacements that don't exist
Type coercion from arbitrary object to Boolean will NPE when the object's toString() returns null (should coerce to false)
Writing only text (or raw text) into a Document via MarkupWriter results in [empty Document], not the actual text
Ajax updates under IE leak lots of memory
ValidationDecorator.insideField not called for Select component
Provide a ValueEncoder for a Hibernate entity automatically only if a mapped class exists
Captured HTML from failed Selenium assertions do not get stored in the correct place on Windows
Tapestry 5.1 seems incompatible with Spring 3
ClassPropertyAdapterImpl should skip static  fields
javax.management preventsTapestry apps from being deployed on GAE
Upgrade to latest Javassist version to avoid LocalVariableTable exceptions (especially on Google App Engine)
A user defined activate event handler appears to execute *before* the event handler supplied by @PageActivationContext, making defensive coding impossible
Use of @Contribute annotation does not work properly with marker annotations
A form control component (such as TextField) whose id is "id" can confuse client-side logic for the Form DOM object
Marker annotations used with services that have contributions should be applicable to methods (as well as fields and parameters) for compatibility with @Contribute
MultiZone update from EventLink with Form fails in Internet Explorer
LinkSubmit broken in IE 7 mode
ValueEncoderSource does not define a @UsesMappedConfiguration annotation
The name "JavaScript" should have a capital "S" but is inconsistent in some class and interface names
When contributing to a service using a "contribute" method, the service id from the method name now matches case-sensitively to the service id (it should be case insensitive)
XSS vulnerability in calendar component (apply to 5.1.0.x)
Form component generates invalid xHtml: there should not be the "name" attribute - Applied to 5.1
Add Error component that presents validation errors of a single field
Tapestry should have support for IE conditional stylesheets
Add support for "cancel" submit buttons (which bypass client-side validation)
provide access to component parameters from within mixins
Add Zone parameter to Select component
Add @Translate annotation to define name of translator to be used with a bean property (rather than lookup by property type)
Add a @QueryParameter annotation for parameters to event handler method
Add annotation @SessionAttribute to map a field to a specific session attribute
Tapestry should provide a mixin for ensuring that the client id of a ClientElement is rendered
T5 should pick up validators to be applied to a field from the containing component's .properties file.
Add Trigger component to trigger a component event during rendering
Tracking issue for Tapestry/JSR-303 integration
Create more flexible API for testing with Selenium that allows for multiple test cases to share a single instance of Selenium/SeleniumServer/Jetty
TapestryFilter should be able add additional modules to the Registry to accomidate different testing (or other) execution configurations
Live class reloading for service implementations
Validator Macros: Combine multiple common validators into a single term
In places where an invalid key is used to accessed a named value, Tapestry should report the possible names better (using HTML lists, rather than a long comma-separated string)
The application global message catalog should be injectable into services
Extend PropertyAccess to understand Scala style properties (which use a different naming convention than JavaBeans)
Non-visual mixin to generate events as it begins/ends rendering (useful for generating matching JavaScript)
Live class reloading should extend to proxied objects (such as from ObjectLocator.proxy()
Zones that initially render inside a Form should support updates within the Form
LocalizationSetter service should expose the supported locales as a list of Locale and as a SelectModel
New annotation: @HeartbeatDeferred to mark component methods that should execute at the end of the current Heartbeat
Provide new SelectModelFactory service that can automatically build a standard SelectModel from objects and property names
Introduce public service responsible for handling page activation
Provide an annotation to support automatic discarding of the persistent fields after a component or page method invocation
Easy way to customize search locations for page and component templates
New page-level events to "decorate" component event and page render links
Add annotation, @Contribute, to allow service contributor methods to be arbitrary named
Add support for Bulgarian locale
The TriggerFragment mixin would be more useful if it could invert its logic, i.e., make a a fragment visible when a checkbox was turned off
Move all Tapestry 5 configuration keys to a constant class
Provide access to annotations of service implementation class
Allow component libraries to contribute extra resources to the global application catalog
Property names (in property expressions) should be able to read or update public variables
Make it easy to implement a page callback mechanism
Allow blackbird to be disabled in production mode
Allow services defined by module tapestry-ioc to be advised and decorated
Change template parser to not use StAX, as it is not (yet) compatible with Google App Engine
The Form event "validateForm" is awkwardly named and should be replaced with the simpler name "validate"
Upgrade Selenium dependencies to version 1.0.1
Hidden should support ClientElement and support informal parameters.
Tapestry should ensure that mixins are applied in a deterministic order.
tapestry should mark via annotation which annotations are component-specific vs. more general
Provide bean and display blocks for java.util.Calendar
Provide ApplicationStatePersistenceStrategy for Hibernate entities
ProgressiveDisplay should include a read-only body property of type Block, just like Zone
PageRenderLinkSource should add additional methods for creating a Link when you have the page's activation context as an EventContext
Improve documentation of @Persist annotation
Layout component documentation is not very clear about directory structure
include a diagram showing how incoming requests pass through the different pipelines, filters and dispatchers
The ActionLink documentation is missing the option to use object arrays as context inside templates
In a stack trace, any lines associated with line #1 of a class are likely to be synthetic methods and should be classified as "uninteresting"
Tapestry.ajaxRequest is insufficient when doing extra, such as adding query parameters
Introduce a symbol for tapestry.js
Easier way to initialize a JSONObject with keys and values
Provide fluent API for order constraints of contributions
Make use of Selenium.showContextualBanner() when running integration tests
Tapestry should support the full range of Unicode characters acceptible by Java as property names
Validation of properties of type java.util.Collection should fail when the collection is empty
When autobuilding a Java bean (such as a Session State Object), the code should use the OperationTracker
It should be possible to override a components message catalog
Don't set Expires header when tapestry.production-mode is false
Cannot use Scala for Tapestry IOC Modules
Built-in mechanism to identify self-referential links and/or event/render requests
Upgrade Tapestry's built-in copy of prototype.js to version 1.6.1
Allow access to static resources (css, js, jpg, jpeg, png, gif) inside the app package
Upgrade EasyMock dependency to release 2.5.2
ObjectLocator.autobuild would be more useful with an override that allowed a message about the object to be described
FormFragment component should include a parameter to control whether non-visible content is included in the form submission
Provide remote management of the page pool settings
Form component should be more careful with the validation tracker to ensure that a session is not created unless needed
Reorganize ComponentClassTransformWorkers to start moving away from Javassist
Field autofocus should be done via Tapestry.init instead of using $ function
When Autobuilding a class, the constructor to be used should be identified in the trace output
Message about missing or wrong retention policy of a marker annotation is misleading
Provide a new return type for event handler methods that would trigger the rendering of a particular page without a redirect

(5.2.0-SPNAPSHOT Maven dependencies) tapestry-hibernate-5.2.0 jar generated with tapestry-hibernate-5.2.0-yyyyMMdd.hhmmss-?.jar > tapestry-hibernate-5.2.0-SNAPSHOT.jar whereas all other jar are using -5.2.0-SNAPSHOT
Submit component should allow return values from event handler methods triggered by its event
Upgrade selenium dependencies to 1.0.3
It would be nice if there was a way for committers to run individual integration tests again
Rewrite URLRewriter integration tests to use new SeleniumTestCase instead of deprecated AbstractIntegrationTestSuite
Rewrite live reload integration tests to use new SeleniumTestCase instead of deprecated AbstractIntegrationTestSuite
Change Tapestry client-side JavaScript to make the tapx/Confirm component easier to implement
Add API to prevent a particular service implementation from being live reloaded
Provide hook to post-process properties files before rolling them into component Messages
When a Zone component sends an Ajax request for a client-side update, it should pass an extra query parameter identifying the zone's client-side id
Merge symbol values into property values from a bean definition
The ExceptionReporter should be configured to mark more of the Tapestry generated classes (used for method & field access and method advice) as hidden by default
CLONE -Handler method of LinkSubmit component should accept a context
Create a binding prefix, "symbol:", that is used to access IoC symbols
Handle array types in property expressions
Add a new validator, "none", used when overriding the @Validate annotation
Documentation for the Submit and LinkSubmit components should identify that you should cancel defer when inside a Loop
LinkSubmit should render minimally (and as <span> tag) and then fill in the details on the client
HibernateGridDataSource should assign the result of Projections.rowCount() to java.lang.Number when determining the number of rows for the configured entity type
Provide a convinient method to build and start the registry
Refactor out a new base class between org.testng.Assert and org.apache.tapestry5.ioc.test.TestBase for non-mock related tests
TypeCoercer should include a method exposing the coercion it would use for a given source and target type
When in development mode, Tapestry should pretty-print JSON content
JavaScript initialization inside the partial page render Ajax response should be unquoted
Client-side exceptions during Tapestry.init() should be caught and reported with the console
Make better use of the OperationTracker to identify what's going on during a request (and especially, during page construction)
Remove automatic injection of service id into parameters of type String
Provide a ComponentEventResultProcessor that sends an error response to the client
Eliminate page pooling using shared page instances that separate their structure from the mutable state
Use recent Groovy/GMaven version and fix GMaven configuration in tapestry-core POM
Create old URL rewriter compatibility package for 5.3.4
CookiesImplTest does specify a domain cookie with a domain not prefixed with a . (dot)
Fix TranslatorSourceImplTest
Add ioko-tapestry-commons to the related projects list
remove ide-specific files from all sub-modules and add them to svn:ignore
Method AbstractField.createDefaultParameterBinding() should be deprecated
Upgrade Spring dependencies to version 3.0.0.RELEASE
Remove formos references from 5.2.0 archetype
Upgrade TestNG dependencies to version 5.12.1
Upgrade Hibernate dependencies to 3.5.2
Rename annotations @QueryParameter and @QueryParameterMapped (both introduced in 5.2.0) to more mnemonic names
